items.content_html:
** do not merge until all manifest V3 content is ready **

Summary

MV3 Content Security Policy key changes:

  • updated extension_pages
  • added sandbox

Test results and supporting details

Tested and passed npm test.
items.title: MV3 Content Security Policy

items.content_html:
This PR updates and corrects the real values for Chromium (Chrome, Opera, Samsung Internet, WebView Android) for the signal member of the WritableStreamDefaultController API, based upon results from the mdn-bcd-collector project (v6.0.1).

Tests Used: https://mdn-bcd-collector.appspot.com/tests/api/WritableStreamDefaultController/signal

Check out the collector's guide on how to review this PR.
items.title: Update Chromium versions for api.WritableStreamDefaultController.signal
